[[File:1973 - 02-26 - Stefan Petterson.jpg|thumb]]
On [[26 February]] [[1973]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] sent a ''[[Wikipedia:Procuration|per procurationem]]'' '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|letter]] to Stefan Petterson'''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.autographs.se/lit2.html|articlename=1973 Letter|dated=|website=www.autographs.se|accessed=3 May 2015}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Reply to letter from Stefan Petterson [[23 February]]. Apologies for not being able to offer a longer reply.
*'''Description:'''  Type-written letter (1 page).
*'''Publication:''' None.
